verses.verse: <S%H2502>Deliver<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%> <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%>
those who <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts.<s%> They <S%H3117>continually<s%> gather themselves <S%H1481>together<s%> for <S%H4421>war.<s%>
They have <S%H8150>sharpened<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent.<s%> <S%H5919>Viper<s%>'s <S%H2534>poison<s%> is under their <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who have <S%H2803>determined<s%> to <S%H1760>trip<s%> my <S%H6471>feet.<s%>

The <S%H1343>proud<s%> have <S%H2934>hidden<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for <S%H6566>me,<s%> they have spread the <S%H2256>cords<s%> of a <S%H7568>net<s%> by the <S%H3027>path.<s%> They have <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H4170>traps<s%> for <S%H5542>me.<s%> Selah.
I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "You are my <S%H410>God.<s%>" <S%H238>Listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>cry<s%> of my <S%H8469>petitions,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> you have <S%H5526>covered<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5402>battle.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5414>don't<s%> grant the <S%H3970>desires<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> <S%H7563>Don't<s%> let their evil <S%H2162>plans<s%> <S%H7311>succeed,<s%> or they will become proud. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
As for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of those who <S%H4524>surround<s%> <S%H5999>me,<s%> let the mischief of their own <S%H8193>lips<s%> cover <S%H3680>them.<s%>
Let burning <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H4131>fall<s%> on <S%H5307>them.<s%> Let them be thrown into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> into miry <S%H4113>pits,<s%> from where they never <S%H6965>rise.<s%>

An evil <S%H376>speaker<s%> <S%H3559>won't<s%> be established in the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H7451>Evil<s%> will <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to overthrow <S%H4073>him.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>maintain<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
Surely the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to your <S%H8034>name.<s%> The <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
